thread.title: This stag with a bra stuck on its antlers has some serious explaining to do
thread.title_full: This stag with a bra stuck on its antlers has some serious explaining to do

author: April Hautea
title: This stag with a bra stuck on its antlers has some serious explaining to do
text:
It's not uncommon to see herds of deer out in the Scottish Highlands, especially during spring time.
SEE ALSO: Mini horses lead cops in a nail-biting, low-speed chase
It is less common to see a leading herd member dawning a brassiere on his antlers.
Anne MacInnes snapped this incriminating photo of a stag in Wester Ross, Scotland.
Looking for a wild stag night? Visit Applecross. Just down the Bealach na Brà. Can be pretty deer. So we've herd. #Brambi pic.twitter.com/2lsD4EmZbM
— Ullapool News (@TheUllapoolNews) March 29, 2017
Perhaps the stag caught got tangled up in the pink undergarment while walking through a clothes line.
Or maybe he has a more salacious story to tell? Irrespective, it's not something you see everyday.
WATCH: This nature-inspired wind turbine is shaped like a tree
